CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 9, 1959, pg. A16, reads: "Adorable - When the Beauty Shop Owners gave their annual beauty clinic and fashion show, they featured imported models from Philadelphia.  Here is an adorable pair, May Madrid of Quakertown, and little Pittsburgher Carolyn Hayes, wearing mother-daughter outfits."
TitMainTitle: Carolyn Hayes and May Madrid holding parasols at Beauty Shop Owners' fashion show, Roosevelt Hotel
